tags.name: s-badge
tags.description: Badges are used to draw attention and display statuses or counts.

attributes.name: float
attributes.description: Determines if the badge should be floated over the left or right corner.

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: Whether or not the element is disabled.

attributes.name: position
attributes.description: Sets how this element is positioned in a document.

attributes.name: aspect
attributes.description: Sets a preferred aspect ratio for the box.

attributes.name: scroll-x
attributes.description: Sets the desired behavior when content does not fit in the parent element box (overflows) in the horizontal direction.

attributes.name: scroll-y
attributes.description: Sets the desired behavior when content does not fit in the parent element box (overflows) in the vertical direction.

attributes.name: z
attributes.description: Sets the z-order of a positioned element and its descendants or flex items. Overlapping elements with a larger z-index cover those with a smaller one.

attributes.name: width
attributes.description: Sets this element's width.

attributes.name: width-min
attributes.description: Sets the minimum width of this element. It prevents the used value of the width property from becoming smaller than the value specified.

attributes.name: width-max
attributes.description: Sets the maximum width of this element. It prevents the used value of the width property from becoming larger than the value specified.

attributes.name: height
attributes.description: Sets this element's height.

attributes.name: height-min
attributes.description: Sets the minimum height of this element. It prevents the used value of the height property from becoming smaller than the value specified.

attributes.name: height-max

attributes.name: corner
attributes.description: Rounds the corners of this element's outer edge. You can set a radius to make circular corners.

attributes.name: corner-t
attributes.description: Rounds the top-left and top-right corners of this element by specifying the radius of the circle defining the curvature of the corner.

attributes.name: corner-r
attributes.description: Rounds the top-right and bottom-right corners of this element by specifying the radius of the circle defining the curvature of the corner.

attributes.name: corner-b

attributes.name: corner-tr
attributes.description: Rounds the top-right corner of this element by specifying the radius of the circle defining the curvature of the corner.

attributes.name: corner-br
attributes.description: Rounds the bottom-right corner of this element by specifying the radius of the circle defining the curvature of the corner.

attributes.name: corner-bl
attributes.description: Rounds the bottom-left corner of this element by specifying the radius of the circle defining the curvature of the corner.

attributes.name: inset
attributes.description: Rounds the corners of this element's outer edge. You can set a radius to make circular corners.

attributes.name: inset-t
attributes.description: Sets how far the top edge of this element is from the top edge of its closest positioned parent. It has no effect on non-positioned elements.

attributes.name: inset-r
attributes.description: Sets how far the right edge of this element is from the right edge of its closest positioned parent. It has no effect on non-positioned elements.

attributes.name: inset-b
attributes.description: Sets how far the bottom edge of this element is from the bottom edge of its closest positioned parent. It has no effect on non-positioned elements.

attributes.name: inset-l
attributes.description: Sets how far the left edge of this element is from the left edge of its closest positioned parent. It has no effect on non-positioned elements.

attributes.name: inset-lr
attributes.description: Sets how far the left and right edge of this element is from the left and right edge of its closest positioned parent. It has no effect on non-positioned elements.

attributes.name: inset-tb
attributes.description: Sets how far the top and bottom edge of this element is from the top and bottom edge of its closest positioned parent. It has no effect on non-positioned elements.

attributes.name: margin
attributes.description: Sets the margin area around this element. A positive value places it farther from its neighbors, while a negative value places it closer.

attributes.name: margin-t
attributes.description: Sets the margin area on top of this element. A positive value places it farther from its neighbors, while a negative value places it closer.

attributes.name: margin-r
attributes.description: Sets the margin area on the right side of this element. A positive value places it farther from its neighbors, while a negative value places it closer.

attributes.name: margin-b
attributes.description: Sets the margin area below this element. A positive value places it farther from its neighbors, while a negative value places it closer.

attributes.name: margin-l
attributes.description: Sets the margin area on the left side of this element. A positive value places it farther from its neighbors, while a negative value places it closer.

attributes.name: margin-lr
attributes.description: Sets the margin area on the left and right sides of this element. A positive value places it farther from its neighbors, while a negative value places it closer.

attributes.name: margin-tb
attributes.description: Sets the margin area below and above this element. A positive value places it farther from its neighbors, while a negative value places it closer.

attributes.name: padding
attributes.description: Sets the padding area around this element.

attributes.name: padding-t
attributes.description: Sets the padding area on top of this element.

attributes.name: padding-r
attributes.description: Sets the padding area on the right side of this element.

attributes.description: Sets the padding area below this element.

attributes.name: padding-l

attributes.name: padding-lr

attributes.name: padding-tb
attributes.description: Sets the padding area above and below this element.

attributes.name: layout
attributes.description: Sets the layout of this element so that its children are arranged in either a row or column.

attributes.name: layout-align
attributes.description:
When this element's children are arranged in a column (layout="column"), this controls their horizontal alignment.
When this element's children are arranged in a row (layout="row"), this controls their vertical alignment.

If not provided a value, it will use "center"

attributes.name: layout-justify
attributes.description:
When this element's children are arranged in a column (layout="column"), this controls their vertical alignment.
When this element's children are arranged in a row (layout="row"), this controls their horizontal alignment.

attributes.name: layout-wrap
attributes.description:
Sets whether children are forced onto one line or can wrap onto multiple lines. If wrapping is allowed, it sets the direction that lines are stacked.

If not provided a value, it will use "wrap".

attributes.name: expand
attributes.description:
Sets how much this element will expand to fill the space available in its parent container.

If 0, the element will not expand.
If 1, the element will expand to fill all available space.

If not provided a value, it will use "1".

attributes.name: color
attributes.description: Sets the main color of the content rendered inside this element.

attributes.name: text-font
attributes.description: Specifies which font this element will use to render text.

attributes.name: text-size
attributes.description: Sets the size of this element's font.

attributes.name: text-leading
attributes.description:
Sets the height of a line of text.
It's commonly used to set the distance between lines of text.

attributes.name: text-kerning
attributes.description:
Sets the letter spacing of text.
This value is added to the font's natural letter spacing.
Positive values cause letters to spread farther apart, while negative values bring letters closer together.

attributes.name: text-weight
attributes.description: Sets the weight (or boldness) of the font.

attributes.name: text-case
attributes.description: Forces the specified text casing.

attributes.name: text-align
attributes.description:
Sets the horizontal alignment of text.

If not provided a value, it will use "center"

attributes.name: text-wrap
attributes.description:
Determines whether text will wrap if there is not enough horizontal space to fit it on a single line.

If not provided a value, it will use "wrap".

attributes.name: text-color
attributes.description: Sets the color of text rendered inside this element.

attributes.name: text-stroke-color
attributes.description: Sets the color of the stroke rendered around the text.

attributes.name: text-stroke-width
attributes.description: Sets the width of the stroke rendered around the text.

attributes.name: text-underline-offset
attributes.description: Sets the distance between the line and the text being underlined.

attributes.name: text-decoration-thickness
attributes.description: Sets the thickness of underline or strikethrough lines.

attributes.name: bg-color
attributes.description: Sets the background color of this element.

attributes.name: bg-repeat
attributes.description:
Sets how background images are repeated.

If not provided a value, it will use "repeat".

attributes.name: bg-align
attributes.description:
Sets how background images are aligned.

If not provided a value, it will use "center".

attributes.name: bg-fit
attributes.description:
Sets how background images are fit in their parent container.

The image can be stretched, or constrained to fit the available space.

If not provided a value, it will use "contain".

attributes.name: clip
attributes.description:
Creates a clipping region that determines what part of an element should be shown.
Parts that are inside the region are shown, while those outside are hidden.

If not provided a value, it will use "circle".

attributes.name: border-color
attributes.description: Sets the color of the border around this element.

attributes.name: border-width
attributes.description: Sets the width of the border around this element.

attributes.name: shadow
attributes.description: Adds a drop shadow to this element.

attributes.name: shadow-inset
attributes.description: Adds an inner shadow to this element.

attributes.name: opacity
attributes.description:
Sets the opacity of an element.
Opacity corresponds to how transparent the element is,
with 0 being fully transparent and 1 being fully opaque.

attributes.name: pivot
attributes.description: Sets the origin point for this element's transformations.

attributes.name: delay
attributes.description: Specifies the amount of time to wait before starting a property's transition effect when its value changes.

attributes.name: duration
attributes.description: Specifies the length of time a transition should take to complete.

attributes.name: animate
attributes.description: Applies an animation to this element.

Creates a clipping region that determines what part of an element should be shown.
Parts that are inside the region are shown, while those outside are hidden.

If not provided a value, it will use "circle".

attributes.name: opacity
attributes.description:
Sets the opacity of an element.
Opacity corresponds to how transparent the element is,
with 0 being fully transparent and 1 being fully opaque.

attributes.name: pivot
attributes.description: Sets the origin point for this element's transformations.

attributes.name: delay
attributes.description: Specifies the amount of time to wait before starting a property's transition effect when its value changes.

attributes.name: duration

attributes.name: animate
attributes.description: Applies an animation to this element.

attributes.name: z

attributes.name: layout
attributes.description: Sets the layout of this element so that its children are arranged in either a row or column.

attributes.name: layout-align
attributes.description:
When this element's children are arranged in a column (layout="column"), this controls their horizontal alignment.
When this element's children are arranged in a row (layout="row"), this controls their vertical alignment.

If not provided a value, it will use "center"

attributes.name: layout-justify
attributes.description:
When this element's children are arranged in a column (layout="column"), this controls their vertical alignment.
When this element's children are arranged in a row (layout="row"), this controls their horizontal alignment.

attributes.name: layout-wrap
attributes.description:
Sets whether children are forced onto one line or can wrap onto multiple lines. If wrapping is allowed, it sets the direction that lines are stacked.

If not provided a value, it will use "wrap".

attributes.name: expand
attributes.description:
Sets how much this element will expand to fill the space available in its parent container.

If 0, the element will not expand.
If 1, the element will expand to fill all available space.

If not provided a value, it will use "1".

attributes.name: color
attributes.description: Sets the main color of the content rendered inside this element.

attributes.name: text-font
attributes.description: Specifies which font this element will use to render text.

attributes.name: text-size
attributes.description: Sets the size of this element's font.

attributes.name: text-leading
attributes.description:
Sets the height of a line of text.
It's commonly used to set the distance between lines of text.

attributes.name: text-kerning
attributes.description:
Sets the letter spacing of text.
This value is added to the font's natural letter spacing.
Positive values cause letters to spread farther apart, while negative values bring letters closer together.

attributes.name: text-weight
attributes.description: Sets the weight (or boldness) of the font.

attributes.name: text-case
attributes.description: Forces the specified text casing.

attributes.name: text-align
attributes.description:
Sets the horizontal alignment of text.

If not provided a value, it will use "center"

attributes.name: text-wrap
attributes.description:
Determines whether text will wrap if there is not enough horizontal space to fit it on a single line.

If not provided a value, it will use "wrap".

attributes.name: text-color
attributes.description: Sets the color of text rendered inside this element.

attributes.description: Sets the width of the stroke rendered around the text.

attributes.name: text-underline-offset
attributes.description: Sets the distance between the line and the text being underlined.

attributes.name: text-decoration-thickness
attributes.description: Sets the thickness of underline or strikethrough lines.

attributes.name: bg-color

attributes.name: bg-repeat

attributes.name: bg-fit
attributes.description:
Sets how background images are fit in their parent container.

If not provided a value, it will use "contain".
